page.title: 04CHALGRAVE MANOR FARM
page.content: {Chalgrave Manor}is a farm consisting of 600 acres,which is about an average size of farm. On the farm{wheat, {barley,oats}and{rape}are grown. This year there were 65 acres of oats,125 acres of barley,222 acres of wheat, and 150 acres of{rape.}Harvest time is from July to September starting with rape.The farm has 150 cattle from autumn to the summer. The beef cattle are fed on barley stubble (instead of burning it), as well as straw. There are two woods on the farm consisting of 25 acres, one is called{Warrenmore} and the other{Great Wood.}There are 5,000 trees in the wood and 1,000 were planted last year to replace those killed by disease. The farm house was built in{1714}and monks used to live there.At present there are four workers on the farm,who are each allocated a{tied cottage.
